page.title: 10SCHOOL DINNERS
page.content: {SCHOOL DINNERS}COST 60P PER DAY. A FEW CHILDREN WHO LIVE NEAR SCHOOL GO HOME EACH DAY, A SMALL NUMBER BRING SANDWICHES TO EAT AT LUNCHTIME,AND A MAJORITY OF CHILDREN HAVE A SCHOOL DINNER. EACH CLASS TAKES IT IN TURNS TO GO FIRST FOR DINNER AND THE CHILDREN QUEUE UP AND COLLECT A TRAY, A GLASS AND CUTLERY. THEY HAVE A CHOICE OF MAIN COURSE, VEGETABLES AND A SWEET. 22ND JULY 1985. TODAYS{MENU} CONSISTED OF:- CHEDDAR CATHERINE WHEELS WITH SALAD AND NEW POTATOES. SAVOURY MINCE WITH NEW POTATOES,BAKED BEANS OR CABBAGE. SEMOLINA PUDDING,FLAPJACK WITH CUSTARD, FRESH APPLE,CHEESE AND BISCUITS,YOGHURT OR MILK. SPECIAL{DIETS}ARE ALSO PROVIDED FOR CERTAIN CHILDREN.
